EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading our eBook, The Connected Cabin Advantage
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You!
Here is your copy of The Connected Cabin Advantage <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/landing-pages/e-book/TheConnectedCabinAdvantage_EBook_2021.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},Thank you for downloading our eBook! If you'd like to receive newsletters, product information and special offers from our the team, please opt-in here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]>.Best,The Honeywell Forge Team Download Now <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/landing-pages/e-book/TheConnectedCabinAdvantage_EBook_2021.pdf]]>
